name: Save The Brainless
description:
A Player has decided to play this game, but they don't know how to play it, so your task is to help him finish the level by placing and breaking blue blocks, to cover dangerous areas and to create paths to safety.

-- Tip: Download for better experience.

How to play:

  • Left Mouse Button - Place blocks in empty places
  • Right Mouse Button - Break blue blocks

Honest feedback would be greatly appreciated!
